section.3: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that she said to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ):"Safiyyah bint Huyai began menstruating." The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Perhaps she has detained us. Did she not circumambulate the House with you?" She said: "Yes." He said: "Then you can leave
